text: Hamline University (/ˈhæmlɪn/ HAM-lin) is a private university in Saint Paul, Minnesota. It was founded in 1854, Hamline is the oldest university in Minnesota, the first co-educational university in the state, and is one of five Associated Colleges of the Twin Cities. == Other websites == * Official website Category:1854 establishments in the United States Category:1850s establishments in Minnesota Category:Colleges and universities in Minnesota Category:Saint Paul, Minnesota
title: Hamline University
